prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Synth Lead, Piano, Organ, Drums, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Bass, Synth Lead, Piano, Organ, and Drums, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Synth Lead, Piano, Organ, and Drums, but no Guitar.

Style 3:
This song is made up of Bass, Synth Lead, Piano, Organ, and Drums, omitting the Guitar.
